top.description: Microsoft develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.
Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.
Amazon.com, Inc., is an American multinational conglomerate technology company based in Seattle that focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
Alphabet Inc. is an American multinational conglomerate headquartered in Mountain View, California. It was created through a restructuring of Google on October 2, 2015
Facebook, Inc. is an American social media and technology company based in Menlo Park, California.
INTL FCStone Inc. is a financial services organization. The company operates in five areas: Commercial Hedging, Global Payments, Securities, Physical Commodities, and Clearing and Execution Services.
Verizon Communications Inc. is an American multinational telecommunications conglomerate and a corporate component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average.
Adobe Inc., known until October 3, 2018 as Adobe Systems Incorporated, is an American multinational computer software company headquartered in San Jose, California, and incorporated in Delaware.
